requirements.summary: Replace the impact metric label for value "15" so it clearly indicates "States Served" (not countries) everywhere it appears on the site.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page impact metrics strip, the metric with value "15" no longer uses the label "Countries" and instead uses "States" or "States Served".

On the Programs/Impact page "Collective Impact" summary, the metric with value "15" no longer displays "Countries Served" and instead displays "States Served" (or equivalent wording that clearly indicates states, not countries).
No other impact metric values are changed.

file_operations.description: Update the impactMetrics entry with value "15" to use a label that clearly communicates states (e.g., change label from "Countries" to "States Served"), without changing the numeric value or other metric labels/values.

In the "Collective Impact" summary section, replace the label "Countries Served" associated with the value "15" to "States Served" (or equivalent states-focused wording), without changing the numeric value or any other metrics.
